items.sentence: Tom had no idea what time Mary would get home.
Tom tried not to think about what he had done.
Tom tried to figure out the answer by himself.

Let\'s pitch the tent while it\'s still light.
Tom committed suicide by jumping off a bridge.
Tom wanted to spend some time alone with Mary.
What is the highest mountain in North America?

I was so excited that I couldn\'t fall asleep.
